products.title: Apple MacBook Air 13.6" w/ Touch ID (2025) - Midnight (Apple M4 / 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD) - English
products.summary: Experience unparalleled speed and efficiency with the 13-inch MacBook Air, powered by the cutting-edge M4 chip. Boasting up to 18 hours of battery life and a stunning Liquid Retina display, this superlight and ultra-thin device is perfect for work and play on the go. With innovative features like Apple Intelligence and seamless integration with other Apple devices, the MacBook Air is a versatile powerhouse for all your productivity needs.
products.tagline: Unleash Limitless Power with MacBook Air M4

products.title: ASUS ZenBook 14 OLED Laptop (14" FHD+ Touchscreen, Intel 14-Core Ultra 5 125H) 8GB DDR5 RAM, 512GB SSD, AI PC, 15-Hr Long Battery Life, FHD Webcam, Windows 11 Home W/ AI Copilot
products.summary: Experience unparalleled sophistication and speed with our ASUS ZenBook 14 OLED Laptop, equipped with a top-tier Intel Core Ultra 5 processor and a stunning 14" ASUS Lumina OLED touchscreen. Enjoy all-day productivity with its 75Wh battery and immerse yourself in crystal-clear sound from the new Super-linear speakers tuned by Harman Kardon. Plus, enjoy peace of mind with our 1-year warranty included.
products.tagline: Elevate Your Efficiency with Zenbook 14 OLED

products.title: Acer Aspire Go 15.6" Laptop - Silver (Intel N100/8GB RAM/512GB SSD/Windows 11)
products.summary: Maximize your productivity and entertainment with the Acer Aspire Go 15.6-inch laptop featuring an Intel N100 processor, 8GB RAM, and a speedy 512GB SSD. Enjoy crisp visuals on the FHD display, fast internet connectivity with Wi-Fi 6, and seamless multitasking with Windows Copilot AI assistance. Elevate your computing experience with Windows 11 preloaded and stay connected with versatile connectivity options.
products.tagline: Unleash Productivity with Acer Aspire Go Laptop
